data.text: Na lɔxɔɛ e yi bɛɛti nan bama Yudaya bɔxi ma:
Naadɛ xa rabi, ɲama tinxinxi xa so,
Mixi naxan ɲanige fan,
Wo wo yɛtɛ taxu Alatala ra tɛmui birin,
A bara yɛtɛ igboe ragoro,
misikiinɛe nun setaree naxan iboronma.
I tan Alatala tinxinxi, i tinxintɔɛ xa fe sɔɔnɛyama nɛ.
Muxu ɲɛrɛma i xa sɛriyɛ nan ma, muxu xaxili tixi i ra.
Muxu nii yati hayi na i ma kɔɛ ra, a i fenma gɛɛsɛgɛ.
Kɔnɔ mixi ɲaaxie tan, hali e kinikini e ma,
Alatala, i sɛnbɛ gbo, kɔnɔ e mu na toma.
Alatala, i bara bɔɲɛsa fi muxu ma,
Muxu Marigi Alatala, marigi gbɛtɛe bara nɔɛ dɔxɔ muxu ma bafe ra i tan na,
Na marigie bara faxa, e mu baloma sɔnɔn, e nii mu kelima abadan.
Alatala, i bara i xa ɲamanɛ ragbo yɛ,
Alatala, e nu na i fenfe i xa ɲaxankatɛ kui,
E nu e xui itema i ma alɔ ginɛ naxan na di barife tɔɔrɛ kui.
Muxu bara tɔɔrɔ na di barife kui,
Kɔnɔ i tan nan faxa mixie rakelima faxɛ ma.
N ma ɲama, wo xa gbilen wo xɔnyi,
Alatala fama nɛ kelife a xɔnyi,
